ComicInfo.Summary:
The finale to Carol's video game adventure is here! Can Carol figure out how to level up and defeat the glitch? Or will it be GAME OVER for the world's strongest avenger?!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Sweeney Boo | 1-2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Megan Levens | 3 | Note: The digital edition (7/21/2021) for this volume was released before the print edition.
